index.position: Web developer, open source enthusiast and focused on simple and efficient solutions.

language.title: Foreign Language Fluency
language.content: I lived and studied in England for one year, which allowed me to achieve fluency in English.

linux.title: Linux and Command Line
linux.content: I use GNU/Linux as my operating system, which has provided me with familiarity with Command Line, Bash, and Docker.

learning.title: Continuous Learning
learning.content: I enjoy staying updated and learning new technologies and skills. That's why I always seek to take online courses to expand my knowledge.
